title: loss of champions
body: i was gifted xayah{{champion:498}}  and rakan{{champion:497}}  from another summoner and recently i have seen both of them removed from my account with no notification as to why they were removed .....could i get some help about  the situation?

replies.body: That's strange, sorry to hear!  :(  We can take a closer look though, and offer more context.  Just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what's up.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
